content: Thank you, Heidi, for this wonderful nugget of inspiration! I intend to take it to heart and blog more. I’ve been working on a novel for young people and oddly, I find the process of writing a book seemingly more easy than blogging … perhaps because I am so new to blogging. To me, blogging feels like an on-going round of cocktail parties … each blog being a different party where one must be witty and wise or instructional and inspirational, and/or so many other things. But, in any event, your encouragement of just do it is excellent advice. So, thanks, again. P.S. I love your writing!
